newsitem.title: SOUTH KOREA: S.Korean won closes higher on dollar/yen movement.
newsitem.headline: S.Korean won closes higher on dollar/yen movement.

text.p: The won closed slightly firmer against the dollar and dealers said the won/dollar drifted sideways in a very tight range throughout Friday.
The won finished at 890.90, compared with Thursday's close of 891.30. After opening at a low of 891.20, it hit 890.80.
Dealers said the won/dollar movement was confined in a narrow range on fears of central bank intervention and expected exporter sales toward the month-end.
They forecast the dollar would move in the 890-892 won range next week. Monday's mid-rate was estimated to be fixed at 891.00 against 891.40 today.
